detail_desc: Push-up lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Imitation leather sandals with two straps at the front with a metal buckle and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded fabric insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Open jacket in airy, crinkled viscose with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and a rounded hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trousers in marled sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with foldover jersey ribbing at the waist and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, medium coverage at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
V-neck kaftan in a viscose weave with airy sections and a slight sheen. Fringing at the hem.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with an opening at the top with a tie detail at the neck and a seam down the front.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.

Knee-length, off-the-shoulder dress in a plumeti weave with elastication at the top and short raglan sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Seam and a twisted drawstring at the waist and tiers to the hem. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Calf-length skirt in a soft rib knit with a high, elasticated waist and decorative buttons and a slit at the front.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif at the top and an unlined hood with a small wrapover at the front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a round neckline and ribbed trims.
Sandals with straps at the front and elastic heel straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Lace-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend in a slightly shorter style with long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Seams on the shoulders, a chest pocket with a decorative fabric appliqué and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Top in soft, fine-knit, fluffy yarn with a collar and buttons at the top decorated with rhinestones and pearly beads. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves with ribbed trims and a ribbed hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in ribbed jersey with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves, a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric and a pair of trousers in cotton twill. Top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-breasted, straight-style coat in a felted wool blend with peak lapels, flap front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a text print motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slip-on trainers in cotton twill with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Jewellery set with an adjustable metal ring and necklace. Necklace with a chain and pendant. Adjustable length of necklace 39-47 cm.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a sheen. One wide and one narrow shoulder strap, a seam at the waist and press-studs at the crotch.
High-waisted, fitted skirt.
Knee-length mesh dress with short sleeves and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend containing some cashmere.
Cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Set with a short-sleeved cotton piqué polo shirt and pair of soft shorts. Polo shirt with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with elastication at the back of the waist, a fake fly with a button, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket with a button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless top in airy, tiered chiffon with a raw-edge neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in airy chiffon with embroidery and lace details. Elastication at the top, long, flared sleeves and an elasticated hem. Partly lined.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Hair elastics in various designs without metal clips. Two with a glittery appliqué.
Striped wrapover blouse in a cotton weave with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Seam at the waist with a narrow tie.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted mirrored lenses.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a high waist and button fly.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim. Short dolman sleeves and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Joggers in washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, contrasting colour sections at the knees and ribbed hems.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Soft, non-wired bra in patterned microfibre with lined, triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Lace trim around the cups and an elastic trim at the hem. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cap in washed cotton twill with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Jumpsuit in organic cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Contrasting colour zip, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Short, boxy shirt jacket in cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Cropped sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Long raglan sleeves with a text print and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Skirt in soft cotton chambray with adjustable elastication at the back of the waist, discreet side pockets and buttons down the front with two decorative buttons at the hem. Unlined.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fully lined, slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and a zip fly with a button.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a round metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Small metal hoop earrings in various designs. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs fastenings, short sleeves and short legs.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long ball chain necklace with two pendants. Length 67 cm.

Gently tailored, padded jacked in woven fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Skirt in a sturdy jacquard weave with decorative press-studs at the front and a concealed zip with a button at the back.

Hoodie in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the hoodie is recycled.

Push-up bras in organic cotton jersey with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Dungarees in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with shoulder straps that fasten at the front, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and ribbed hems. Partly lined.
One-shoulder, fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with elastication at the top and one long sleeve.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with block heels and a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel approx. 9 cm.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Straight-cut top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Loose fit with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Block-coloured top in sturdy cotton jersey with long sleeves with a text print, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Bucket hat in pile with a satin lining. Width of brim approx. 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with crossover straps at the back and an elasticated hem.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband. The polyester content of the tights is partly recycled.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Baby Exclusive. Pull-on trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved body with a low-cut back and press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Regular waist with a ribbed section inside the back of the waistband and a concealed drawstring at the front. Zip fly and slim legs.
Shorts in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button. Side pockets, leg pockets and fake welt back pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening.

Jacket in a patterned rustle weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
